column4: if I use the command here:  http://pastebin.com/m589ff7bc    will this bring me to a command line system or to anunusable one starting from ubuntu?
that looks like the majority of the ubuntu-desktop package, nothing that looks like it would leave your system unuseable though, I would also recomend purging the configuration files as well
something like http://pastebin.com/m2257e0b1 after removing those.
